Content:: Ranjith Jinatissa Aluwihare (born May 5, 1958) is a Sri Lankan politician.[1] He is a representative of Matale District for the United National Party in the Parliament of Sri Lanka. He is also the most senior member of the parliament for the United National Party from the Matale District. He is currently the Hon. State Minister of Tourism. He resides in Matale, Aluvihare. He is the son of Alick Aluwihare and brother of Wasantha Aluwihare.[2]  This article about a politician from Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Ranjith Aluwihare - Wikipedia
